{{short description|Street in Gondolin}}
[[File:Quentandil - Gondolin Map.png|thumb|Map of Gondolin showing the Great Market on the eastern side]]
The '''Road of Arches''' was a street in [[Gondolin]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. It connected the [[Square of the Palace]] to the north-west [[Place of the Well]].<ref>{{LT2|III}}, p. 182</ref>

Its [[Qenya]] name was '''''Kúnë Mallë'''''.<ref>{{PE|13}}, p. 105</ref>
